name: UnofficialDieHardFacts
0:
”Alexa, open unofficial die hard facts.”
”Alexa, Ask unofficial die hard facts for a fact.”
”Alexa, ask unofficial die hard facts to give me a die hard fact.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: unofficial die hard facts
des: Unofficial facts about the Die Hard movies. This Alexa app allows you to ask Alexa about facts from the Die Hard movies. Unofficial Die Hard Facts is in no way affiliated with 20th Century Fox or Dev Bootcamp.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
